string-array.item: Hello there! | I\'m really excited that you\'re giving Track & Graph a shot.\n\nIf you like it, please consider upgrading to premium- it supports development AND disables banner ads!

Ahoy! | Just popping by to see how things are going. Everything\'s on track, I hope?\n\nRemember that you can upgrade to premium any time you like. It\'ll help support further development, and you\'ll disable the banner ads (and also these popups).

How\'s it going? | I hope Track & Graph is working out well for you.\n\nIf you\'re getting good use from it, maybe premium is the thing for you- kill the banner ads and support further development in one fell swoop!

Keep it up | Wow, you\'re really getting some mileage out of Track & Graph. Awesome!\n\nIf you ever want to get a little more from it, consider bumping up to premium. It strips out the ads, and I\'ll never bother you with these popups again!.
Amazing! | You\'re a tracking machine. Keep on it!\n\nAnd if you ever feel like kicking a little something my way, premium will always be there for you.
